text.name: system_description
text.text: The Amstrad CPC is an 8-bit personal computer. CPC stands for Colour Personal Computer, although a version with a monochrome monitor was also available. There are three different models, the 464 cassette and then the 664 and 6128 floppy. They sold about three million copies worldwide, including about one million in France.

text.text: Amstrad CPC - это 8-битный персональный компьютер. CPC расшифровывается как Colour Personal Computer, хотя также выпускалась версия с монохромным монитором.
